Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
I have become aware that that the credit reporting agencies may not be in compliance with certain provisions of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) and how it is reporting my credit information.

In accordance of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ) : 605. Requirements relating to information contained in consumer reports [ 15 U.S.C. 1681c ] ( a ) Information exclu
ded from consumer reports. Except as authorized under subsection ( b ) of this section, no consumer reporting agency may make any consumer report containing any of the following items of information : ( 1 ) Cases under title 11 [ United States Code ] or under the Bankruptcy Act that, from the date of entry of the order for relief or the date of adjudication, as the case may be, antedate the report by more than 10 years.

604. Permissible purposes of consumer reports [ 15 U.S.C. 1681b ] ( a ) In general. Subject to subsection ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : ( 1 ) In response to the order of a court having jurisdiction to issue such an order, or a subpoena issued in connection with proceedings before a Federal grand jury.

( 2 ) In accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates.

With subsections 604 and 605, the credit reporting agencies did not get the information of my bankruptcy from the State of Tennessee nor did I express that information to be made public in any expressed written agreement or statement. The three credit reporting agencies received my personal credit information from public records which they are not in compliance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act.

Fair Credit Reporting Act states the regulation and laws that govern the three credit reporting agencies, however the misuse of personal information for financial gain harms consumers. I could not find a place to stay because that was on my credit report and reduce my score. I find it very difficult that I can not find a place to call home in a reasonable area do to the inconvenience of the misuse of my personal credit information.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XX/XX/XXXX, I called Wells Fargo to request a downgrade of my wells Fargo propel card as I was no longer interested in paying the {$170.00} annual fee. I didn't think the fee justified the cards benefit. The representative presented various credit cards I could downgrade to that did not have an annual fee. After a 90-minute conversation, I decided to downgrade to the lower tier of the propel card that did not the annual key. I also allowed the representative to charge my checking account for the annual fee of {$170.00} in case the downgrade process takes long in order to avoid being charge a late fee since the annual fee was due. The representative ensured me everything be process and I will receive the new card in a few weeks. 

In the first half of XXXX, I spent a lot of times traveling which was extended due to the pandemic. I was in the west coast until XX/XX/XXXX. When I returned home in XXXX, I found several letters from wells Fargo stating that I owed them {$170.00} plus late fees/interest. Also, my credit report was flagged for missed payment. At first, I was confused and thought maybe someone stole the new card while I was away and used it. Because I know that I didn't owe wells Fargo anything especially since I paid them the {$170.00} annual fee back in XXXX to avoid any issues relating to downgrading my card. 

After having several conversations with wells Fargo bank tellers and two Case Specialist in the Wells Fargo XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, they confirmed that the representative did not downgrade the card as he ensured me, he will do. Furthermore, they confirmed that they did receive my payment for the annual fee back in XXXX but failed to update my account with the new balance ( which was {$0.00} ) which resulted in them reporting me to the credit bureau. To explain, Wells Fargo continued to charge me for the annual fee even though I had already paid them the fee. Every month from XXXX to XXXX they reported a missed payment to all three credit bureaus. They apologized for their mistake and ensure me that they will contact the credit bureau to remove all the negative marks they put on my account as this was their negligence for not verifying their information about my account. It is now XX/XX/XXXX ( I spoke to them XXXX XXXX ) and the missed payment has not been removed. I also open a dispute with XXXX and XXXX said they refuse to remove it. It seems like the only thing left to do is to take them to court because they are violating the federal fair credit reporting act ( FCRA ) and has damaged my creditworthiness.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
I have contacted Experian a total of three times to dispute inaccurate reporting on my credit report by my student loan servicer. 

The dates I have contacted Experian to file a dispute are : XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX. 

The disputes in XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX were initiated by me through the Experian XXXX app. The XX/XX/XXXX dispute was taken over the phone by a dispute specialist. 

Each of the three disputes have consistently presented the same narrative : my account is being reported as 90 days late during a period of Income Based Repayment with a payment amount of {$0.00} due. 

I have submitted statements to Experian as part of the XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX disputes which reflect that no payment was due during the alleged 90-day delinquency in XX/XX/XXXX. 

I was unable to upload new evidence to the Experian consumer upload site because the files were too big on the first attempt. This caused the website to display an error message on further attempted uploads and also for any other sessions. 

The results from all of my disputes return with no change being made. The reason is because my student loan servicer has certified to Experian that the information is correct and as a result would remain. 

This is a boilerplate response and I do not feel that individual human attention has been given to my dispute. If that were the case, Experian could clearly see that it is not possible for my student loan account to be delinquent when no payment has been due multiple years prior to and after XX/XX/XXXX. 


I am aware of my rights if I disagree with the results. However, the remedies that are listed on my report are not available. I can not submit a statement of disagreement to be listed on my report nor have I been able to obtain the method and details of how the investigation was conducted. 

This is the ONLY delinquency on my report and as a result, my score and credit file are suffering. This impedes my ability to obtain credit which is causing me to suffer a loss. 

Experian should stop acting in favor of the student loan servicer and instead conduct investigation in a neutral format as they are legally obligated to do.

Consumer complaint narrative:
I submitted a complaint to Experian about incorrect information being reported about me on my file. I have been in dispute for ONE item for the past XXXX months. The dispute is for a late payment that happened back in 2018. After speaking with the original creditor, XXXX XXXX, has applied the payment to the following month instead of the month that I was making the payment for, causing the late reporting. Well shockingly enough XXXXXXXX XXXX can not update the information on their end .... as a creditor I find this to be lazy and just unacceptable. If you, the creditor, were able to report the wrong information, you should be report the correct information, especially when it was the creditors fault. I digress. 
Upon many supervisors telling me the same thing, I submit a dispute with Experian, with proof of statements with the XXXX letterhead about the error. Experian, has conducted a terrible investigation because it completely disregarded the statements and said the information was verified. ( Being late ) How can you verify something without showing me WHY it's verified, who you spoke with and when, and what documents did you show me that you have received from XXXX verifying that I was late? Because I have sent YOU ( Experian XXXX the documents supporting that I was not late. 

I am not the only one who is having issues with this. I'm sure if enough people came together about the neglect for this terrible system, multiple class action lawsuits would come from this. 

My only anger is that I'm providing proof about the matter and not pulling a lie out of thin air.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
I've recently reach out to XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX on XX/XX/2021 for the XXXX time about verifications of account number XXXX thats reporting on my credit reports. I provided my social security number and account number but the XXXX stated he was unable to find or verify that account. He requested additional information that I can not produce because the account do not belong to me. If the XXXX  of the company can not verify this account, How are you verifying this account? Please send me your verification method and original signed contract in 10 days. 
According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act, Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ), you are required by federal law to verify, through the physical verification of the original signed consumer contract, any and all accounts that you post on a credit report. Otherwise anyone paying for credit bureaus reporting services could fax, mail or email in a fraudulent account. 
Your failure to positively verify these accounts has hurt my ability to obtain credit. Under the FCRA, unverifiable accounts must be removed and if you are unable to provide me a copy of verifiable proof, you must remove the account.

Product: Vehicle loan or lease
Consumer complaint narrative: My vehicle was repossessed in XX/XX/XXXX. At that time I tried to pay the full past due balance to redeem my vehicle but Ally would not allow it. At the time I filed a complaint with the CFPB XXXX because my vehicle was repossessed prematurely and because they were not using my mailing address as requested I did not receive the repossession warning notice. Mysteriously, all my monthly statements were going to the correct address but the only repossession notice sent, went to the address on my original loan application. Ally refused to allow me to redeem my vehicle without paying the entire loan in full, as evidenced in their response letter to the CFPB. On XX/XX/XXXX I wired them {$18000.00} which was rounded up, as they gave me {$18000.00} and some change. I called an hour before I wired the money to confirm with the redemption department as every time I called the figure kept changing. I redeemed my vehicle on XX/XX/XXXX. They XXXX XXXX me the title and said I had to sign it back over to them or re-register it again because my car was just about to be sold and the title was taken out of my name. They said as soon as my account closes out they would mail me the title and that it would take 45-60 days. Since then they have refused to give me my title and have claimed that I still owe them money and have been reporting negatively to the credit bureau. I called a few times trying to rectify the issue but everyone I speak with says there's a balance but can't explain why or how the amount changed in 1 hour from the time I called to the time the funds were wired. In XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX I tried calling to see if I could get this taken care of again but with no luck. In XX/XX/XXXX when I logged into my online account it said the Total Due was {$140.00}, the Total Payment Due was {$1000.00} and the Next Due was {$170.00} on XX/XX/XXXX. When I logged on inXX/XX/XXXX and requested a payoff figure it said I owed {$240.00}. I received a letter on XX/XX/XXXX stating I owe {$470.00}. And as of XX/XX/XXXX they are reporting that my account is Derogatory and that I owe {$230.00} clearly there is an error.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
Notice for Proof of Claim Account : ARS ACCOUNT RESOLUTION Service # XXXX To Whom it may Concern : This is a this complaint is submitted Under OHIO LAW U.C.C 1319.12 Taking assignment of debts States ( C ) No collection agency shall commence litigation for the collection of an assigned account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness unless it has taken the assignment in accordance with all of the following requirements : Credit contracts are non-assignable even if the contract has a clause for assignability because it violates the contract Law. Where there is no fair valuable consideration given, the contract or agreement is void ab inito. The debt is non-transferable. If it is a contract for credit or goes to the character of the parties, it can not be transferred or assigned. No state can make a law impairing contracts, Under OHIO LAW U.C.C 1319.12 Taking assignment of debts ( 3 ) The assignment was manifested by a written agreement separate from and in addition to any document intended for the purpose of listing the account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness with the collection agency. The written agreement shall state the effective date of the assignment and the consideration paid or given, if any, for the assignment and shall expressly authorize the collection agency to refer the assigned account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness to an attorney admitted to the practice of law in this state for the commencement of litigation. The written agreement also shall disclose that the collection agency may consolidate, for purposes of filing an action, the assigned account, bill, or other evidence of indebtedness with those of other creditors against an individual debtor or co-debtors.

Dartmouth College v. Woodward 4 Wheat 518 : White v. Hart, 13 Id 646. Once the Creditor writes off a debt, it can not be assigned or Collected. Since this is an error I demand that you send me the following proofs. As you are obligated to do in accordance with the Fair Debt Collection Practice Act. Section 1692 ( g ) : Under the Law, FDCPA, Section 1692 ( g ), you have 30 days to supply these proofs, if more time is needed please contact me by certified mail and I will extend you 15 extra days. I also request to see a certified copy of any contract or agreement between you and the original creditor that gave you the right to collect this debt.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
We began the process to purchase an apartment and signed an purchase option on XX/XX/XXXX. We submitted the application to the loan originator and in XX/XX/XXXX we received a Loan Estimate for a loan of 90 % of the Purchase Price that was the loan that was discussed with the loan originator. All documentation required was submitted to a loan that were pre-approved before we initialize the purchase process. 

On XX/XX/XXXX, and because the appraisal was received for a lower market value amount of the original Purchase Price, we agree with the seller and submitted an amendment to the Purchase Option Contract to reflect a new Purchase Price. After that change we did not receive a new Loan Estimate from the loan originator. 

The process continue and after all updates and documentation provided we received a call from the loan originator officer on XX/XX/XXXX that the loan was approved by the investor at 90 %, as primary residence, but the PMI insurance rejected the coverage due to the condominium can not be insured as primary residence. They give us the alternative and sent new Loan Estimates with loans at 80 % which represent a significant larger amount from us and differences in the closing costs from the original one.

I think is important to add, that from the beginning we made clear that we were not interested in a 80 % loan, so was for us a surprise that at the end of the process they are saying that we have approved a loan that can't be close and feel that we were tricked in the process. We rejected the new loans offer and we are losing the opportunity to buy the apartment. After the rejection of the new loans we had not received comments from the Mortgage Originator.

In follow ups with XXXX XXXX, repeatedly told it would be removed from Credit and yet no follow ups.

Now, before the institute responds with a rehears line, I've always deposit this financial institute check before for many years with US Bank and this check is a well established company ( XXXXXXXX XXXX ) that I have had for over 5 years as well, and this check was about the same amount as prior check amounts ( under {$1000.00} ) and I've never had a check bounce, decline or suspiciousness with a check nor my account. I've never had an overdraft or any fraud related suspicious activity with my 10 plus years with this bank. All of my accounts with US Bank is, and has been in excellent standings prior to this teller encounters which is why I believe was an act of retaliation and discrimination on that date and a person like her should not be in the banking profession mishandling Federal currencies any way she feels when she get upset with a customer. Consumer complaint narrative:

Experian is not cooperating with me on this matter and refuses to remove all fraudulent and inaccurate information from my credit profile. Experian keeps giving me the same auto-responses and they are avoiding me and refuse to look into this matter.

The law plainly states that failure to investigate these items within 30 days gives a reason to immediately remove those items from my credit report. It has been over 60 days so they should be deleted promptly. 

I demand these accounts be deleted immediately or I will file for litigation due to the stress you have caused me. My information was also impacted by the XXXX  data breach and may have gotten into the hands of the wrong person.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
After my personal information was exposed in the data breach of the Washington XXXX XXXX XXXX, I contacted each of the XXXX credit bureaus to place a freeze on my credit, as was recommended. However, Experian has refused to place a freeze on my credit, instead demanding that I send them a giant pile of documents and photocopies in first class mail to Texas, and then wait XXXX weeks to see if they felt like complying. 

I have the legal right to freeze my credit, and they do not have the right to refuse that request. They are obligated to place a freeze as requested in a timely manner, and I dont have weeks to wait, as the fraudsters who stolen my information are not going to sit around waiting a few weeks before trying to steal my identity. 

I have tried repeatedly to contact them, but there is no way to reach them. I can only access a recording recapping the instructions to gather, photocopy, and mail to them all of my personal information and identification, a piece of mail confirming my name and current address, etc., and to check back in XXXX days.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
I was unaware of this regulation at the time, but then again I was trusting that my lender had our best interest at heart as well as knew the laws that govern them, but in reviewing XXXX  and the CFPB 's website it has come to my attention that when closing on a home the lender is required to provide you with a closing disclosure form issued at least 3 days before we sign the mortgage documents, at least 3 days before the borrower becomes contractually obligated to the lender so we may compare and ask questions before we go to the closing table. In our situation this was not the case but at the time I trusted my lender and mortgage loan officer, XXXX XXXX was doing right by me and was doing everything by law, I see now that is not the case. 

My husband and I did not receive our final closing disclosures until XX/XX/2020 at XXXX. We went to the closing table on XX/XX/2020 at XXXX. Based on our signed Note we became obligated to the lender on XX/XX/2020. We didn't even have a full 24 hours nor did we have a loan officer at our closing table to answer our questions. 

This is the second complaint I am writing to the CFPB regarding issues I have had with my mortgage originator and loan officer. This is another example of predatory lending as it is a blatant violation of the laws created to stop predatory lending and is the exact reason the CFPB had to be created.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative: I have ongoing disputes with Experian as 3 collections ( and addresses reported by them ) have appeared so far on my credit report that happened due to identity theft. The first collection/address were disputed successfully and I currently have 2 pending collections under dispute. I submitted an FTC report and have submitted several to Experian in the past few weeks ( updated over time as each new collection and address have appeared ). I keep getting the same email from them stating " The identity theft report that you provided to us does not meet the guidelines established by the federal Fair Credit Reporting Act for the following reason ( s ) : It was not filed with a law enforcement agency which subjects the person filing the report to criminal penalties relating to the filing of false information. '' I have called several times and no rep has ever been clear as why they can not accept it ( is it because I keep updating it and the previous one submitted is no longer valid? or something else? ) .Today, XXXX/XXXX/2021, I called again to get clarification as to why I received the email again and why they can not accept the FTC report I submitted. Rep said " We know the report is fake '' basically accusing me of faking an FTC report when it was literally filed and downloaded directly from the FTC 's website. I asked the rep to clarify why they think the report is fake if it was downloaded from the website ; I explained that the report has been updated by me every time new collections/information has come up and submitted. Rep refused to answer, stating again that they know that the report is fake, that she could not reveal details but that they are aware the report is not real. NO EXPLANATION. I asked if they could send me a letter instead to explain why if she could not do so over the phone and the rep stated she could only send me the same email they keep sending which is NO HELP. Rep stated to contact the collection company directly instead and if they accept the report then they would remove the collection which XXXX.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX, XXXX SOC SEC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, FL XXXX ATTENTION DISPUTE DEPARTMENT TODAYS DATE : XX/XX/XXXX SHEFFIELD FINANCIAL CO XXXX Your company have violated FCRA 615 ( f ) ( 15 U.S.C. 1681m ( f ) ) ( f ) Prohibition on sale or transfer of debt caused by identity theft You have not responded to my request to provide me with an investigation report.

I need this resolve, under the Fair Credit Reporting Act, these disputed items may not appear on my credit report if they can not be supported by any evidence ( 1 ) In general No person ( company ) shall sell, transfer for consideration, or place for collection a debt that such person has been notified under section 1681c-2 of this title has resulted from identity theft.

( 2 ) Applicability The prohibitions of this subsection shall apply to all persons collecting a debt described in paragraph ( 1 ) after the date of a notification under paragraph ( 1 ). ( 3 ) Rule of construction Nothing in this subsection shall be construed to prohibit -- ( A ) The repurchase of a debt in any case in which the assignee of the debt requires such repurchase because the debt has resulted from identity theft ; ( B ) the securitization of a debt or the
pledging of a portfolio of debt as collateral in connection with a borrowing ; or ( C ) the transfer of debt as a result of a merger, acquisition, purchase and assumption transaction, or transfer of substantially all of the assets of an entity.

A person that furnishes information to any consumer reporting agency shall have in place reasonable procedures to respond to any notification that it receives from a consumer reporting agency under section 1681c-2 of this title relating to information resulting from identity theft, to prevent that person from refurnishing such blocked information.

The reference items are listed below please take this matter very serious SHEFFIELD FINANCIAL CO  XXXX I have report your company to consumerfinance.gov As a form of record and I am prepare to sue your company Example In re Portfolio Recovery Associates, LLC Telephone Consumer Protection Act Litigation, Case No. 11-MD-2295-JAH-BGS, in the U.S. District Court for the XXXX District of California Stop collection proceedings against me Signatures on applications and accounts Investigators report XXXX, XXXX SOC SEC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, FL XXXX

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
I contacted CFPB in XX/XX/XXXX to report a problem with an escrow account that my mortgage lender created in error last year. The complaint number is # XXXX. 

That complaint was resolved by XX/XX/XXXX, when my mortgage lender closed the escrow account and reversed the payments that it had improperly debited from my mortgage payments to credit to the invalid escrow account. 

I recently received my form 1098 Mortgage Interest Statement for the XXXX tax year from my mortgage lender. On previous statements from previous tax years, Box 10 has been empty. On the statement for the XXXX tax year, Box 10 contains an amount -- {$810.00}. This amount is the same figure that factored into the escrow error that my lender made last year. 

I contacted my lender twice today ( XX/XX/XXXX ) and spoke to two separate customer service representatives to discuss the amount listed in Box 10 of the document, and to request a corrected XXXX Mortgage Interest Statement if the {$810.00} negatively impacts my tax filing. Neither representative seemed to fully understand the potential problems that this {$810.00} figure can cause and both stated that issuance of a corrected 1098 Mortgage Statements is not possible. Yet, the document itself clearly contains a box that the lender is required to check if a corrected document is issued and there is also verbiage on the back of the document informing the mortgagee how to proceed in the event that an error is identified. Neither representative knew how to assist me. 

My tax preparer stated that the {$810.00} figure that currently appears in Box 10 will reduce any tax refund that I may receive unless the XXXX statement is corrected. She also stated that this information on the form has been reported to IRS, so it must be corrected by the lender if it is incorrect. The escrow account was created by the lender in error, so the lender is obligated to correct its error, so that I am not further impacted or penalized by IRS.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative:
I am using a Costco Visa card through Citibank to purchase online through Costco.com and avoid going into the stores. The purchases are being charged a PREMIUM price for home delivery. As a result, I am accumulating 2 % cash back by using the REQUIRED Costco Visa card. I received a {$120.00} Rewards Certificate in the Mail and called Citibank to apply this certificate to my credit card payment. They stated that though they allowed it this year, they are no allowing it in XXXX. 

They are requiring that the only way it can be used it to PHYSICALLY shop in Costco. COVID-19 is no better than it was in XXXX and is in fact much worse in South Florida with new Variants. I have an XXXXXXXX XXXXXXXX and am too young to get the vaccine. I WILL NOT BE SHOPPING in any stores for the foreseeable future. Citibank is only too willing to have my charge to their card, but is unwilling to accept the reward certificate I receive from doing so. This is egregious and forcing people who want to spend their cash back into the stores and endangering their health and the health of others. 

I want Citibank to agree to take the certificate as an alternative form of payment against my credit card payment. It has a number that is unique to the certificate the correlates to the bar code. This should be a very easy thing to process and they DID accept this as a form of payment in XXXX, so their systems are already set up to handle this transaction.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative:
My husband income was cut by 40 % last XXXX and returned to normal XX/XX/XXXX. He is salaried and worked long hard hours to help his company maintain as a good manager would. He did not qualify for government help as some other can. We quickly depleted our hard earned 3 months worth of savings and are now facing having to dip into our retirement savings. I wrote a letter to Department Store National Bank ( the bank behind Macy 's credit cards ) along with Citibank to ask them to please lower the outrageous interest rates ( 25-28 % ) to help be able to make the monthly payments. They refused. SECOND ISSUE. This last month I needed to pay the bill from two seperate accounts. After I paid half of the min due, I went to pay the rest out of another bank account of mine but it refused to take the payment saying that only one payment can be made per day resulting in a XXXX late fee. THIRD ISSUE. For XX/XX/XXXXpayment I tried to do a forbearance for the month. I had to send an email per Macy 's credit card 's webpage. I did and got turned down. I was charged late fee for paying 1 day late while waiting on their response. 

Seems to me that if Department Store National Bank ( DSNB ) or Citibank would, at the least, lower the outrageous interest rate, consumers like myself would be about pay our dues!

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
Thank you in advance for your attention in resolving unfair practices with Selected Portfolio Servicing. As of today XX/XX/2021, I have been denied a forbearance or a reasonable loan modification. SPS is not being helpful during the Covid 19 crisis. I asked for a forbearance and instead they offered a modification with a 3 month trial period. Not knowing what they were going to come back with till after a 3 month trial period. I was shocked to see the unreasonable & unheard proposed terms. It sounds like a major rip off. They have to stop ripping us off. I used to work in mortgage lending and currently a Notary Signing Agent and I do not see these types of terms they want us to agree to! 

This is a second loan. 
6 months unpaid mortgage payments equal to a total of {$3500.00} with fees which I still need to review but it is less then $ XXXX. XXXX Months of XXXX ) Modification trial periodXXXX Paid {$360.00} each month and on XXXXas well. 

Proposed Modification received XX/XX/2021 New payment {$360.00} which may adjust. 
New Maturity date XXXX, will add 14 years. Current Maturity date XXXX. 
Final ballon payment on the interest bearing principal balance of {$34000.00} is due on the XXXX Date. Yes XXXX XXXX, XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. 
Amortization Term XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX. Basically 40 years. 

We owe less than $ 5k and they want to charge over $ 50k. Includes the ballon payment and the difference in the new maturity date. Sounds like a rip off to me! 

We have no problem keeping the same monthly amount of {$580.00} & extending the term by 6 months or even 1 year like we did with our 1st mortgage with no problem. If they want to call it a Forbearance or a Modification it's ok. What's not ok, they tell us it is their investors choice. They don't disclose who the investor is and we have the right to know this as well. 

Hope you are able to help us and other upcoming customers with the same issue. I have been reading reviews on Yelp and XXXX  and they are being referred to CFPB. Thank you for your assistance. 

XXXX XXXX

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative:
I applied for a car care credit card through Synchrony credit. I have spent the better part of the last year fixing my credit up to XXXX, so I really expected it to be accepted. 

However, I was completely shocked to see that I was declined. When I read the fine print a little further, it showed that my score was XXXX. My score hasn't been XXXX for years! And I pay good money to monitor my credit. 

After double-checking, they are, in fact, accessing a completely incorrect credit score. This is a problem because I would never have performed a hard pull unless I thought for sure I'd get approved. As previously stated, I'm rebuilding my credit and wouldn't want to lose even just a couple of points. 

I tried calling and got nothing but scratchy, pre-recorded prompts which ended because I wasn't approved and don't have an account number. There was an option to write them. But, realistically, is that really going to help me? There should be a way to get answers from a real person for something like this. 

I'm actually glad this happened because I would never trust this company to accurately report my payments if they can't even obtain an accurate report in the first place, but something needs to be done. 

Thank you!

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative: I had a mortgage with XXXX XXXX XXXX that was ultimately foreclosed on. I began missing payments on this account earlier than XXXX, and this account should be removed from all credit bureaus at this point, but XXXX XXXX XXXX refuses to remove it. Beginning in XXXX of XXXX, I applied for a short sale, and even had buyers interested. XXXX denied the short sale claiming the offer was too low. I applied for a short sale again, which XXXX denied once again claiming the property wasnt marketable. I then in XXXX of XXXX requested a deed in lieu of. I called back two weeks later after not hearing from anyone, and was told I had been denied a deed in lieu because I had not completed a short sale process. I was completely floored as I had already gone through the short sale process and been denied twice!! I filled a XXXX  complaint following that incident, which wasnt responded to until XXXX, and I was still requesting a deed in lieu at that time. XXXX  drug this out until XX/XX/XXXX, then still didnt have it officially recorded until XXXX. XXXX has the worst business practices Ive ever encountered. Ive have been through enough because of their mishandling of my case, and their complete incompetence. I just shy of two years ago was able to get another mortgage through the VA, but I had to write a letter to HUD to requesting to have the flag removed from my credit early to do so. I explained the same information above to them, they obviously agreed it was poorly handled and granted my request. Im asking that this finally be removed from my credit report with so three bureaus since this was so poorly handled, couldve been resolved sooner, and shouldve absolutely been removed by now anyway.

Product: Debt collection

This debt was already paid in full via electronic check and still remains on my credit file with XXXX. 

Due to the fact that I was not given the proper 30 days from receipt of the notice dated XX/XX/2021 to dispute the debt which was already paid, I was treated unfairly for not allowing me the proper time to dispute the debt, a full 30 days, which Sequium reported prematurely.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
Please be advised this is my THIRD WRITTEN REQUEST and FINAL WARNING that I fully intend to pursue litigation in accordance with the FCRA to enforce my rights and seek relief and recover all monetary damages that I may be entitled to under Section 616 and Section 617 regarding your continued willful and negligent noncompliance.

Despite two written requests, the unverified items listed below still remain on my credit report in violation of Federal Law. You are required under the FCRA to have a copy of the original creditors documentation on file to verify that this information is mine and is correct. In the results of your first investigation and subsequent reinvestigation, you stated in writing that you verified that these items are being reported correctly? Who verified these accounts? You have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my signature on it ) as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ). Furthermore you have failed to provide the method of verification as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). Please be advised that under Section 611 ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA you are required to promptly DELETE all information which can not be verified.

The law is very clear as to the Civil liability and the remedy available to me ( Section 616 & 617 ) if you fail to comply with Federal Law. I am a litigious consumer and fully intend on pursuing litigation in this matter to enforce my rights under the FCRA.

I demand the following accounts be verified or deleted immediately.

For my son with an XXXX XXXX.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
I was contacted XX/XX/XXXX by an attorney working on behalf of Military Credit Services stating that I had a judgement entered against me in XXXX in XXXX, Virginia. Upon research appears this was common practice of Military Credit Services ( aka Freedom Stores ) that affected members of the military. During the time of the loan in question I was stationed at XXXX XXXX, NC. Though I have no recollection of visiting these stores, it is entirely possible that I purchased something from such a location. 

The attorney went further to explain they would not enforce a garnishment but would proceed to put a lien on my home if I failed to pay. He also informed me of an interest rate of 19.96 % having been entered during the judgement and relayed that over {$2000.00} had accumulated in the nearly 10 years of this judgement being entered. This account had went from around {$1300.00} to about {$3300.00} in the time since judgement. I had never been served during this time period and was unaware of such activity taking place without my right to dispute or appear in court. 

From subsequent research I was able to find that many of these claims were set aside or refunded, as they showed lack of proper process in notification. This issue has apparently eluded XXXX and XXXX XXXX ( the attorney that has reinstated the adverse credit items on my report and contacted me for collection ).

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XXXX I pulled my 3 free credit reports from XXXX and after looking through my Experian credit report, I noticed some discrepancies and violations of my rights as a federally Protected consumer under Title 15 Chapter 41. I sent Experian a written dispute ( attached ) which they received on XXXX informing them that they were infringing upon my rights as a federally protected consumer. In this correspondence I informed them of rights that I had under Title 15 Chapter 41 and they ignored those rights and verified accounts on my report that should have never been on my report in pursuant to 15 USC 1681a ( 2 ) ( B ) which states that any authorization or approval of a specific extension of credit directly or indirectly by the issuer of a credit card or similar device should be excluded from a consumer report. The definition of a credit card under 15 USC 1681 is the same as it is under 15 USC 1602 ( l ) which is the term credit card means any card, plate, coupon book or other credit device existing for the purpose of obtaining money, property, labor, or services on credit. Notice congress said ANY card. The credit card is my social security card. This is the credit card I used to originate every consumer credit transaction disputed. All these disputed transactions should be removed from my consumer report pursuant to 15 USC 1681a ( 2 ) ( B ). 

The accounts in reference to the dispute are as follows : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
I received correspondence from XXXX  via email regarding a 2004 student loan in the amount of {$420.00} with instructions to reply to the email in order to prevent the loan from going into default status. I replied to the email each time it was sent but did not receive a response. It turns out that their instructions were incorrect and that no one at XXXX was monitoring that mailbox. 

The loan was subsequently placed into default and I was instructed to make 9 consecutive payments in a 10 month period so that the loan would be returned to " good standing. '' I made the required loan rehab payments and then proceeded to pay off the loan balance. XXXX then informed me that the loan would remain in default status because I had not submitted paperwork regarding the loan rehab. 

A loan rep had sent me invalid links to sign documents electronically. I requested proper links for documents several times but received no response. 

My credit report still reflects a defaulted loan and XXXX either does not reply to my requests for correction or replies with a form letter that is unrelated to my request This has caused me irreparable financial harm.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
On or about XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX incorrectly reported my credit card account to Experian as being charged-off. This apparently happened to hundreds of thousands of XXXX XXXX customers at the same time. 

XXXX XXXX services claims that this error was corrected a few days later but it has caused lasting damage that can not be cured under their mandatory arbitration clause that requires XXXX  of dollars in filing fees. 

As a result of this incorrect report, hundreds of thousands of their customers had substantial credit line decreases on other bank credit cards held resulting in higher utilization rates on those cards and lower credit scores. 

The damage XXXX XXXX XXXX has done is enormous and a short apology by their representatives is not enough. They need to be held accountable by the CFPB and other agencies the US government including the bank regulators.

Product: Checking or savings account
Consumer complaint narrative: I was in XXXX XXXX with friends on a trip in XXXX when my wallet and phone were stolen at a restaurant. After failing to find the stolen phone and wallet, I contacted SUNTRUST and reported my card stolen. At that time they went over several transactions that included ATM withdrawals. During this recorded line, I let them know what was my last transaction and all the fraud one. They made two cases - one for the ATM charges and the other for actual credit charges. At the same time I had to contact XXXX and try to get a new phone. I received a letter stating that both fraud charges were denied and contacted SUNTRUST to find out why. They refused to give us information and stated that we could only do an appeal. They sent us the form needed and I filled it out. In the appeal, I showed proof of requesting new phones, money transfers that my wife sent to my friends since I had no way of getting cash since my bank account was emptied. After 45 days - where we called several times and were told that no information could be given - we received a second denial. There was no explanation, no documentation of the investigation to back up the decision. We recorded this phone call because of all the false information the bank kept giving us. We were finally sent to a supervisor who stated that there was nothing else we can do. After an appeal is denied there is no futher procedure to fight for injustice. There is no proof of the investigation and the supervisor could not give us a reason for the denial. We recorded the supervisor informing us the the decision is given to a specialist and once they decide SUNTRUST will not do anything else. My identity was stolen, my bank account was emptied ( over {$1000.00} ) - my bank history shows I have never taken out more than XXXX cash ever at one time - EVER since I opened the account but they refused to find 5 transactions of XXXX at an atm unsuspicious! At a time where we need funds and shouldn't be playing around with a family 's finances, SUNTRUST literally told me they would do nothing. I'm considering getting an attorney because this is UNFAIR and ILLEGAL!

I open to look into the situation and see that tbis company has reported me 4 times once on a weekly basis to the credit bureau for the same account. '' I asked her if she was sure because I tought that it was suppose to be 30 60 90 days and she told me not so. They are allowed to report this on my credit weekly. Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
I was shocked when I reviewed my credit report this week and I found multiple inaccuracies on my credit report from the 3 major credit bureaus from a collection company that I never have dealt with before. I've attempted several times to ratify the issue with the original creditors and credit bureaus and they still reporting inaccurate, unverifiable information. I have disputed this item with the credit reporting agency and they reported you confirmed the account as valid. I honestly do not believe to ever have any relationship with this collection agency or original creditor. Also there are several inaccuracies with this account the way it's reporting and that's a total violation of FCRA and FDCPA laws and regulations. In a good faith effort to resolve the matter amicably, I must demand proof of this debt, specifically the alleged contract or other instrument bearing my signature, as well as proof of your authority in this matter. Absent such proof, you must correct any erroneous reports of this past debt as mine. I am writing to request that you please provide the following information : 1. Please evidence your authorization under 15 USC 1692 ( e ) and 15 USC 1692 ( f ) in this alleged matter. 2. What is your authorization of law for your collection of information? 3. What is your authorization of law for your collection of this alleged debt? 4. Please evidence your authorization to do business or operate in this state. 5. Please evidence proof of the alleged debt, including the alleged contract or other instrument bearing my signature. 6. Please provide a complete account history, including any charges added for collection activity. 
You have 30 days upon receipt of this letter to provide strict proof of contract. In the event you can not provide strict proof of contract, you must cease and desist any and all collection efforts and immediately remove any derogatory information reported to the consumer reporting agencies. In addition, you will need to provide me your agreement, in writing, that you are closing your file, ceasing collecting activity, and deleting all information related to this reference number from any and all credit reports youve furnished the information to. In the event you transfer this account to an attorney without providing proof of contract, and proving your claim, he/she will be immediate reported to the XXXX XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX for code of ethics violations.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
Dear Sir/maam Subject : complaint about unlawful collection activity of a credit card, & collection agency. 
Being a dentist, I had no source of income for months ( 6 ) last yr, due to covid mandatory shutdown. 
but XXXX XXXX kept calling, emailing me for monthly dues.all credit card cos were required to offer a deferral programme.but this is the only credit card, that did not even have a deferral programme. they only waived late fees for 2 months, and kept charging me even late fees?? 
I talked to them couple of times, once the agent said, its ok if I cant pay, they will stop the collection for a period of time. But they never did that, only kept adding late fees, and sending me monthly bills, month after month.shockingly, they were mean enough to call me all the time, even on my home phone, and disturb sleep of seniors at home! 
Due to their lack of total sensitivity, I stopped even trying to talk to them.whereas, all other credit cards cos, have been humane, and offered my deferment plans.and I am paying them all on time now. 
I do know, that all credit cards cos were supposed to offer deferment plans, to those effected by lockdown, and total loss of income.but, XXXX XXXX had no such plan?? 
I am also head of household, so any effect on my credit score adversely effects the whole family.its not even my fault. 
my office was closed again since XXXX XXXX, due to very high covid cases in this county. 
i am trying to take baby steps to re-open, but not much business.it will take few months to even get business back to where i can afford to pay essential bills. 
dont forget, i have to file taxes too. 
all the late fees added so many times ( aleast 6 times ) need to be removed. 
i can only think of paying sometime next yr, in 2022, not this yr. 
Finally, XXXX XXXX was quick to transfer my acc to a collection agency.i just can not can not afford to pay this years sir. Have soo many urgent bills like electricity, food, gas, rent,,, to pay first. 
I have seniors at home too. 
I have no choice to file a complaint about this ongoing harassment. 
Thanks XXXX XXXX XXXX credit # XXXX

Product: Credit card or prepaid card

At one point in XXXX the investigative department said they would look into it but was never assigned to anyone. This entire time I kept making the statement that i did not want this to affect my credit score. They said they were making corrections. My credit score was negatively impacted and my credit limit was dropped from XXXX to XXXX. I called last week and the week before each time with the person on the only line stating to give it 7 -10 business days to get resolved. At this point I feel like I am being harassed and taken advantage of. At one point i was getting daily calls from a Robo call to pay the bill. I hope that all my calls have been recorded as proof of what I am being put through. My credit score has been negatively affected and I am now having to wait to start my refinance due to the hit on my credit score. I have been treated poorly as I would have expected that by this point I would have been assigned 1 agent to take care of these issues for me. Instead I keep getting different numbers to call at a later date.

Consumer complaint narrative:

XXXX XXXX XXXXXXXX A spokesman said All banks have responsibilities under federal law to cooperate with law enforcement inquiries in full compliance with the law. 

Is this accurate? I thought the RFPA was designed to prevent this very thing. The act was intended to prevent government overreach of consumer financial records. Obviously some of that changed with Patriot Act ( which is unfortunate ) but that has since expired. 

https : //www.federalreserve.gov/boarddocs/supmanual/cch/priv.pdf I would imagine they might cite the Bank Privacy Act. I just can't see how being in DC would give enough cause to suspect you as a terrorist. I would imagine 700,000+ residents would not be happy with that label. 

Did Bank of America do this? 

Was Bank of America provided court orders to release individuals information? 

Why do they think this doesn't violate Fourth Amendment or RFPA?

As you are the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, I would like to understand if you believe this is legal and why. 

I would like to know if Bank of America committed illegal activity and violated either law or the Constitution in the actions taken in XXXX. 

I would like to know what other Banks the government reached out to and if they complied or did not comply. In the article above, it specifically reached out to XXXX XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX. Other banks? 

We need your protection more than ever.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
I received my first contact by mail from Account Resolution Services ( ARS ) on XX/XX/XXXX alleging that I owed a debt and that it would be reported to my credit within 15 days of the letter which was dated for XX/XX/XXXX XXXXI immediately responded to this letter by sending a Validation letter by certified mail on the same date I received it XX/XX/XXXX. However, I did not receive any type of documents providing me with validation of the alleged debt. I then on XX/XX/XXXX sent a dispute letter by certified mail disputing the alleged debt and asking that all negative remarks be removed from my credit file that was reported to the three major bureaus ( XXXX XXXX, XXXX, and XXXX ) on XX/XX/XXXX affecting my credit negatively in a significant way. Not only did I not have the opportunity to respond or dispute this debt in a timely manner before it went on my credit file, my first contact by mail was to tell me it was being reported to my credit by the named company. To add to that I received no documents to validate that I owe ARS or any other company. 
On XX/XX/XXXX I received a letter in response to my validation request from ARS ( Account resolution services ) stating that the debt was verified by them, again this was just a letter from ARS stating this, which is not what I asked for. I asked for validation with proof in the form of documents with the name and address of the alleged creditor among other things that I have not received as of yet. I responded again to tis letter by certified mail stating that I did not ask for a statement of verification from ARS and that they failed to validate the debt and provide me with proof. I asked that because of their failure to do so that the debt be removed from my credit file and closed from their records for good. I also sent a copy of that validation request to the three major bureaus on XX/XX/XXXX and asked that they remove the negative remars from this company as well.

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative:
The alleged debt has been disputed and company still attempts to collect alleged debt which is in violation of 15 U.S. Code 1692g ( b ). 

According to 15 USC 1692g- validation of debts ( a ) Notice of debt ; contents ( a ) ( 1 ), ( a ) ( 2 ), ( a ) ( 3 ), ( a ) ( 4 ), ( a ) ( 5 ) said company is in violation of consumer rights. C.B.A. has no proof of sending any written notice pertaining to collection of alleged debt. C.B.A also has zero proof of any contract entered into by me and said company. C.B.A also never sent original creditor information. 

According to 15 U.S.C.1692f- Unfair Practices- ( 1 ) The collection of any amount ( including any interest, fee, charge, or expense incidental to the principal obligation ) unless such amount is expressly authorized by the agreement creating the debt or permitted by law. 

I have not authorized ANY agreement with Credit Bureau Associates. 
Credit Bureau Associates is in violation of federally protected consumer rights.

Credit Bureau Associates is also in violation of 1692e ( 2 ) ( A ) by furnishing a false representation of the character, amount or legal status of any debt.

15 U.S. Code 1692e ( 2 ) ( B ) any services rendered or compensation which may be lawfully received by any debt collector for the collection of a debt.

Under 15 U.S code 1681b- Permissible purposes of consumer reports ( a ) In general Subject to subsection ( c ) any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : ( 2 ) in accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates.

I have NEVER given C.B.A ANY consent, written or otherwise, instructions or permission to furnish any information on my credit report. 

in violation of 15 U.S. Code 1692d ( 1 ) All actions taken by the company are injurious to my life and credit report by reporting inaccurate, false information. the information being provided to consumer reporting agencies is damaging to my reputation and is defamation of my character preventing me from getting credit. 

Reporting Medical information on my consumer credit report is also a violation of my individual privacy.

Product: Mortgage
Consumer complaint narrative:
I am writing to you concerning an {$3600.00} escrow overage in my Wells Fargo mortgage account that they are refusing to disperse to me. I had applied for a Senior Homeowner exemption in 2020 for my local county ( XXXX, XXXX XXXX and was granted the exemption, thus resulting in the escrow overage.

My income has suffered in 2020, by almost 45 %, and my Social Security isn't helping me cover my expenses. So, I don't understand they will not disburse me the ooverage escrow funds. The funds were in escrow, but they are acting like my account is delinquent, which it is not.

First, I contacted Wells Fargo directly and was refused. Then I wrote to my congresswoman who received an refusal from a case specialist XXXX XXXX. Thank you for any assistance you can provide.

XXXX told me they served my new address, but when I plugged in the equipment and it didn't work, I called them and they admitted they do not serve my new address. I immediately cancelled my account and returned my equipment on XX/XX/XXXX. 

A few weeks later I got a notice that I had a bill due on the cancelled account. I called XXXX and they informed me the bill was an error and my account had XXXX balance. I confirmed this in their online portal ( using my existing account info ). They also told me to ignore any additional statements sent in the next few weeks. Then, on XX/XX/XXXX, I received a collections notice ( reference # XXXX ) from Sequium Asset Solutions for a {$49.00} XXXX  bill on an account number I had never seen before. 

I logged into XXXX and only my old account -- not this account -- showed up, and it told me I had {$0.00} balance. I called XXXX  and discovered that they had, without telling me, created a new account at the address they had never provided Internet access for and transferred a charge they had never informed me about to my new account. I made repeated attempts to log in to the new account to verify the balance but was unable to do so -- it kept showing {$0.00} balance on the old account. 

Finally, on XX/XX/XXXX, I was able to reach someone at XXXX  who allowed me to pay the balance on the new account over the phone. ( I still don't know if this charge was legit or where it came from, but at this point I just wanted to be done with the whole thing so I paid it. ) I am alarmed that they sent the bill to collections while I was actively trying to figure out whether it was legit, and that they transferred it to an account that they never told me about ( therefore making it impossible for me to pay ), and that they told me repeatedly that I had already paid my outstanding balance. I am concerned about the impact this could have on my credit score when it's all a result of really, really bad customer service on XXXX XXXX part.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
In XX/XX/XXXX I contacted Experian to correct a negative payment history on a credit card with XXXX XXXX from XX/XX/XXXX. I provided the following information. 

In XXXX XXXX XXXX I was deployed when all communication was secured for operational security. We were without internet access for approximately 40 days. During this time, the credit card payment was due, but I was unable to make the payment without internet access. As soon as access was restored, I promptly paid the bill in its entirety. 

Experian closed the investigation today. They added the addition to the comment section : " and dispute investigation completed, consumer disagrees. '' The comment could be construed that an investigation was actually conducted, which seems doubtful, and I disagreed with the results of the investigation. To my knowledge I have not been provided with any further information collected during the investigation such as a response from XXXX XXXX. Dispute and disagree are synonymous, so not only could the comment be misconstrued, but it would seem that the entirety of the investigation was to add a comment documenting that I disagreed or disputed something, which required no investigation at all because the " investigation '' was a direct consequence of filing a dispute with the report. 

If Experian or XXXX XXXX had provided documentation or rational to the justification for the negative mark on my credit score, I would have been receptive to concluding this matter ; however, this resolution was recursive and evidences the insincere at best or false claim that Experian actually investigated the matter. If an investigation did not take place, they have willfully neglected their responsibility to investigate this dispute.

Product: Money transfer, virtual currency, or money service
Consumer complaint narrative:
I was caught in a scam purchasing a puppy. I XXXX the breeder later realizing it was a scam. Never received the puppy and was a fake online. 
I filed the dispute with my bank immediately the same day. The woman on the phone told me I would have my funds 7-10 business days. From that period to the 10th business day I had spoken to 4 other associates who all told me I would receive my funds within that 10 day period. I called on the 10th and 11th day and was told I would receive the funds the following Monday ( yesterday ). I called yesterday the woman told me she wouldnt send an email to figure out where my funds are and would have an answer and the funds in my account by today. I called today. The first person told me they had no answer and no information. I called back. Spoke to a gentleman who told me that I wouldnt receive my money back. After weeks of battling this bank and being hung up on constantly, transferred over and over and over again, I basically got told to kick rocks and I wont see my money back. I was told by MANY people I would receive it back a week ago and never did. Even yesterday was told I would see it back and now Im getting a different answer. Im so frustrated with this bank I will never use them again and I will be discontinuing service with them. They are supposed to protect my money and yet they cant protect a scam on my account and then give me false information as to where and when I would get my money.

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
XX/XX/XXXX Transunion XXXX. XXXX XXXX XXXX, PA XXXX Dear TransUnion I recently reviewed my credit report and found unauthorized inquiries. 
I contacted the below creditors and they have NO proof I initiated such inquiries, nor written authorization and have failed to provide any permissible purpose. Since, they do not have my authorization, written nor verbal I ask that you DELETE these authorized inquiries from my credit report immediately as there is no evidence of any authorization, nor any permissible purpose. 

According to Section 604 of the Fair Credit Reporting Act Permissible Purposes of Consumer Reports 15 U.S. Code 1681b In general. Subject to subsection ( e ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : ( F ) otherwise has a legitimate business need for the information ( i ) in connection with a business transaction that is initiated by the consumer.

Under 15 U.S. Code 1681i, Paragraph ( 5 ) Treatment of Inaccurate or Unverifiable Information ( A ) In general. If, after any reinvestigation under paragraph ( 1 ) of any information disputed by a consumer, an item of the information is found to be inaccurate or incomplete or can not be verified, the consumer reporting agency shall- ( i ) promptly delete The following inquiries are unauthorized : Creditor : XXXX XXXX  XXXX  Inquiry Date : XX/XX/XXXX I understand that per the Fair Credit Reporting Act, you are required to notify me of your investigation results within 30 days. My contact information is provided below and I have included proof of my social security and current address to avoid any delays in your response time. 

I look forward to receiving an updated copy of my credit report reflecting the above correction. Thanking you in advance. 
Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, NJ XXXX XXXX XX/XX/XXXX

Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
DEAR Transunion : Thank you for sending me your internal records of the debt ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Account # XXXX, ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) Account XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX ) Account # XXXX, however you did not VALIDATE THE DEBT. YOU DID NOT provide me a copy of ANY original documentation ( a consumer contract with my wet-ink signature on it ) or provide a valid E-Signature stating my " Session '', " Time-Stamp '', " Browser '' and " IP Address '', with the proper paper trail as required under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) I also have provided FACTUAL EVIDENCE ( see screenshots attached ). You deleted this debt on XX/XX/2021 and 7 days later this debt back to my Transunion credit report. You stated by mail that you verified that these items are being reported correctly so how could this happen? I am certain you are aware that it is against the law to threaten suit without the intention of doing so. Therefore, be advised that I am very serious about filing a suit against your company. I HAVE PROVIDED ONCE AGAIN FOR THE 2ND TIME : MY UTILITY BILL FOR ADDRESS VERIFICATION, ID AND SOCIAL SECURITY #, POLICE REPORT, ID AFFIDAVIT via UNITED STATES POSTAL OFFICE CERTIFIED MAIL TRACKING # : XXXX mailed on XX/XX/2021 and delivered and signature by Transunion on XX/XX/2021. 
I was informed on XX/XX/2021 that the item was deleted from my credit report. Now I have discovered that the item has been reinserted on my credit report. 

In accordance with the requirements of the FCRA section 611 ( a ) ( 5 ) ( B ) ( ii ), you are required to notify me of the reinsertion in writing within 5 business days.

( B ) Requirements relating to reinsertion of previously deleted material ( ii ) Notice to consumer If any information that has been deleted from a consumers file pursuant to subparagraph ( A ) is reinserted in the file, the consumer reporting agency shall notify the consumer of the reinsertion in writing not later than 5 business days after the reinsertion or, if authorized by the consumer for that purpose, by any other means available to the agency. 

I am keeping phone recordings and paper trail with all communication.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX XXXX, 2021 - I went to the Pep Boys at XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX, CA XXXX for some brake work. I thought I had {$500.00} in open credit on my Pep Boys card. I had checked online a week earlier and the credit line was active. The bill was {$400.00}. When it came time to pay I presented my Pep Boys CC and it was declined. I called the customer service number and they said it was cancelled since I had not used it. They said I could re apply. I then paid with my debit card. 

XX/XX/2021 - I needed more work done so I applied again and was approved for a XXXX / Pep Boys card with a {$2000.00} limit. See attached. 

XX/XX/ 2021 - I went to the same Pep Boys location for an alignment and suspension work. The bill came to {$420.00}. I had not received my card in the mail yet but had my account number. I had received an approval email and could log into my XXXX / Pep Boys mobile app showing my XXXX / Pep Boys account. 

The XXXX card was not accepted. I had not received the card in the mail so I did not have the expiration date nor 3 digit code on the back. We called Fortive customer service overseas. They said I needed a pre authorization code. She could not give it to me nor did the cashier know what that was. After going back and forth with XXXX customer service I gave up and paid with my debit card. 

So - fortunately I had money in my account to pay. What would have happened if I didn't? I'm sure they would have kept my car until it was paid.

Product: Credit card or prepaid card
Consumer complaint narrative: To Whom It May Concern : This letter is after exhausting all avenues on a current/past situation with Barclay card Frontier credit card. XXXX of XXXX I traveled to Florida for vacation. In order check in my return flight I had to pay with a credit card. I used my XXXX card and paid {$120.00} dollars. When I received my Frontier Barclay Card statement in XX/XX/XXXX, that is when I saw that they auto charged my account for the same amount of {$120.00}. I called Barclay to dispute the charges, sent the statement for my credit card that I used to pay for check in. Called to follow up with Barclay and they said they never received the fax. So I sent it again, this continued for months- with sending the fax statements and being told that they never received the proof. Barclay also advised me to go dispute charges with the other credit card company and I refused that, because I personally paid with that card ( I was not going to dispute something that I paid for ). This continued, within that time I also paid off the balance with Barclay of over {$2000.00} minus the {$120.00} just to close the account and continue to dispute the charges. In XX/XX/XXXX, while this was still going on, I faxed again the statements and Barclay sent a letter to tell me that they received the statements but unfortunately it was past the dispute range and expired. As you can see that I was beyond frustrated- why would I pay a huge lump sum and leave {$120.00} on the account if I owed that. I still call about every 6 months, because now, they put me in collections for {$400.00} and yet I can't even settle that because it has been charged off and they have no way to apply a payment. This has gone way too far on the credit cards part and I feel that proof and faxes were intentionally disappearing or they were giving me the wrong fax number- to where the statements and proof just got dismissed, until they saw that the faxes and the dates of my dispute went out of the range. I would like for this case to be settled and off of my credit report, as it has not only been an emotional mess - when you would be able to see that I have an excellent history of paying bills and not debt with credit cards whatsoever. This whole situation has sabotaged me with lenders and prevented me being able to buy a house with the best credit score I can have if this was not on the report. Please consider reviewing and settling this account in any way to release what is not even my liability.

Product: Payday loan, title loan, or personal loan
Consumer complaint narrative: In XXXX of XXXX I sent a message to M & T Bank to request if it was possible to change the due date of my camper loan. About 2 weeks later I received paperwork in the mail to change the due date. As the camper loan is in both my name and my husband 's name we both signed the paper, I took a copy for my records, and placed it in the mail on XX/XX/XXXX. When no changes were made to the account in XXXX I thought perhaps they require a full billing cycle to make the change. When the change still was not reflected in XXXX I attempted to call the bank with no success. Every time I have attempted to call, which has been over a dozen times, I am looped through their menu and regardless of what options I choose it always ends with a message stating they are experiencing a higher than usual call volume and can not take my call so I should try at another time. After I was unable to reach anyone by phone I sent a message on XX/XX/XXXX through their secure message system on the bank website asking why my account still did not reflect the due date changes. I did not receive a response until XX/XX/XXXX informing me that they never received the mailed paperwork. I was told I could mail a copy again or fax it to a number they gave me and the changes would only take 2 business days to be reflected on my account once they received the paperwork. I chose fax so that I could be sure it was received this time. I faxed the paperwork to M & T Bank on XX/XX/XXXX and received confirmation that the fax was successfully transmitted. It is now XX/XX/XXXX and my account still does not reflect the changes and I have attempted to call 6 different times on XX/XX/XXXX with every call ending with the message indicating they were experiencing a high call volume and to call again later. I sent a message through their secure message system on the website on that same day, XX/XX/XXXX and still have received no response. Our camper dealer secured this loan and we had no idea there are no physical locations anywhere outside of the eastern United States. We live in Colorado and since their phone system is either unmanned or grossly inadequately manned we are literally at their mercy. I have no recourse and I can not reach anyone at this bank to find out why we have been actively working for 4 months to make a simple 10 day change to our loan due date and can not seem to accomplish this. It causes me great concern as to the reliability of this bank and as a loan holder through them I feel incredibly helpless to do anything but continue paying my loan for the next 12 years.

With each question the XXXX XXXX representative and I asked, more obstacles were presented by the agent, couldn't be refunded to the bank, had to be sent by check, takes a minumum of 10 days, fax might not be found, delay delay, etc., etc. To say the process was frustrating was an understatement.

That was 2 and 1/2 weeks ago, and NO communication has come from Loan care. They have refused to return the overpayment. I notified them on the XXXX that if I did not have the refund by XX/XX/XXXX I would be contact the CFPB. That didn't phase them one little bit. 

I do hope you can help. 

Than you. 

XXXX XXXX XXXX

Product: Debt collection
Consumer complaint narrative: XXXX XXXX XXXX, herein known as " Consumer ''. Convergent Outsourcing IncXXXX are herein known as " third party junk debt buyer ''. On or around XX/XX/XXXX, a Notice was sent to this third party junk debt buyer by way of official first class mail with Notary Certificate of Mailing to show and validate a superior claim that should be rightfully provided to show that they are the true subject creditor pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 2072, 24 OK Stat 24-2, 24OK Stat24-35, and 24 OK Stat 60-178-10. The third party junk debt buyer were demanded to provide me with documentation with respects to either an application for credit, services or employment executed with your entity. The documentation requested should support their ability to obtain my consumer credit report ( 15 USC1681 ( b ) ). There has been no response/performance from the third party junk debt buyer. Silence is acquiescence ; acquiescence is estoppels. STATEMENT OF FACT : I do NOT have an application or contract with the third party junk debt buyer nor can one be produced with a wet ink signature as requested. That fraudulent and false claim of debt is hereby Adjourned. A volunteer, stranger, or intermeddler is " one who thrusts himself into a situation on his own initiative, and not one who becomes a party to a transaction upon the urgent petition of a person who is vitally interested, and whose rights would be sacrificed did he not respond to the importunate appeal. '' Laffranchini, 39 Nev. 48, 153 P. at 252. Parties may be considered volunteers if, in making a payment, they have no interest of their own to protect, they act without any obligation, legal or moral, and they act without being requested to do so by the person liable on the alleged, original obligation. Henningsen v. United States Fidelity Guar.Co., 208 U.S. 404, 411 ( 1908 ) ; Smith v. State Sav. & Loan Ass'n, 175 Cal . App. 3d 1092, 1098,223 Cal. Rptr. 298, 301 ( 1986 ) ; Norfolk & Dedham Fire Ins. Co. v. Aetna Casualty & SuretyCo., 132 Vt. 341, 344, 318 A.2d 659, 661 ( 1974 ).

My money is in this bank account, and i have no way of accessing it, nor closing my account, and Citibank refuses to assist me outside of mentioning a letter, that I have yet to receive after almost 2 weeks.

As of right now, I still have zero access to my account ( online banking ) or the money in it. Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative:
To : Whom It May concern : I am writing to dispute a fraudulent charge on my account in the amount of {$590.00}, {$0.00}. 
I am a victim of Identity theft, and I did not make or authorize this charge. I am requesting that the charge be removed, that any finance other charges related to the fraudulent amount be credited, as well and that I receive an accurate statement. This request is made pursuant to the Fair Credit Billing Acts amendments to the Truth in Lending Act, 15 U.S.C. 1666-1666b, 12 C.F.R 226.13. See Also 12 C.F.R 226.12 ( b ) I am writing to request the method of verification for dispute initiated on XX/XX/XXXX and the subsequent response received on XX/XX/XXXX enclosed with this letter. 
In accordance with FCRA, Section 611, I am requesting this information to review for completeness and accuracy and appropriateness. In lieu of sending the information you can reopen the dispute and ensure a proper investigation is performed.
